body.name: 11 Inch Stainless Steel Frying Pan, Nonstick Fry Pan with Honeycomb Carving, Induction Skillet Compatible with All Cooktops, Stay-Cool Handle, Dishwasher & Oven Safe, Non-Toxic (Silver)
features: ✅【Optimal Size】The Aufranc's Stainless Steel Frying Pan (Ø 11 inches, Height 2 inches) suitable for a wide variety of cuisines, it's is ideal for home cooking (3-4 person households). The boxed packaging is also perfect for gifting to friends and family!

✅【Practical & Healthy】The skillet is made of high quality 18/10 stainless steel, which is strong and durable to prevent scratches, corrosion, warping and rusting. A honeycomb carving is etched into the interior of the cookware, making it 10 times more non-stick than traditional stainless steel fry pans! Non-toxic, Free of PTFE, PFOA, PFAS, lead, cadmium and other toxic substances.

✅【All Hobs & Oven Safe & Dishwasher Safe】Tri-Ply structure for fast heat conduction and even heating, making it suitable for use on any type of hob, including induction, gas, halogen and electric. Oven safe up to 480℉/250°C. Enjoy easy cleaning with the Dishwasher Safe kitchen cooking pan!

✅【Art & Life】The mirror-polished stainless steel fry pan has a gorgeous, elegant exterior that complements the honeycomb-carved interior. The double riveted stainless steel handles stay cool at all times. Enjoy this artful and lifestyle set of fry pan!

✅【Aufranc's Promise】We offer a two-year warranty and excellent customer service. You can buy with confidence. If there is any quality problem with the product, please contact us in time, we will provide you with warranty. ⚠️ [Tips] Please use anti-scald gloves after heating in the oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There is a comparable pan for hundreds more. This is great quality for the money and stainless steel to boot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Aufrance frying pan
reviews.reviewText: It’s seems to be a good quality pan . Just the right size and weight. I’m certainly happy so far .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this pan
reviews.reviewText: I've wanted to get a hex pan like this for some time and when saw this I had to get it. I love cooking and need good pans that will last. Even before reading reviews, I ordered and glad I did. I understand all the rave reviews.I like it doesn't have a Teflon coating, so it won't have coating peeling issues like aluminum or ceramic cookware does after months or even years. That is why I had to get rid of several pans, so hoping this one last for years as it is a great pan and my new favorite.It is a very well-made stainless-steel pan. The nonstick provides a nice, easy way to cook without food sticking.Cleaning the pan is so easy, as I usually try and wash pans by hand. I used a sponge, some water read some use little cooking oil so going to try that for now on to keep the pan non-stick and rust-proof.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are really good skillets , I think it could have been 5 star if they came with a lid . At the same price of course .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite frying pan!
reviews.reviewText: The 9.5 inch frying pan comes packaged well in a nice box, but unfortunately there are no detailed use or cleaning instructions included. For this we need to come back to the Amazon site to learn that it is e.g. 500F oven safe and dishwasher safe. Build quality is great with a nice polish and a sturdy riveted handle. While the main hexagonal pattern seems to be a hexclad copy, there are other ornamental features that are actually prettier.It is listed as compatible with all modern cooktops (gas, electric, inductions, etc.) but I was only able to test it on gas, where it worked very well. I tested it for a week with several different foods (fried eggs, stir-fry, fried rice, etc.) and it worked great, heated evenly, and was always easy to clean. Even the bottom side directly exposed to the gas flames still looks like new. This pan will last a long time!Compared to my other frying pans, the bottom corners are very rounded, making it almost "wok like". This is an advantage under most use cases, but limits the number of eggs that can be fried at once. For that we are probably limited to the flat part. No big deal.Overall, this is my new favorite frying pan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nicely constructed but it is practically a wok due to bowl shape
reviews.reviewText: This pan is sturdy, very solid, and has a nice think well-fastened handle. The non-stick surface is a series of hexagons and is kind of bumpy but does work. It is easy to clean. It works well on my induction stove. However, there is one major problem. Instead of a 9-inch flat surface for cooking, it is only about 6 inches across then rises up the sides like a bowl. Cooking in it is more like a wok and would d work well for stir frying. Things like a larger piece of meat, strips of bacon, or a large omelet are impossible to cook correctly. I cannot recommend this unless you really would like a bowl shaped fry pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I can not say enough good things about this pan! For the price you can not beat the quality! It cooks even and washes up very nice because of its non stick. My daughter got expensive pans for Christmas this year and I could see no difference of quality against a very expensive high end pan. You need to buy this pan! IT IS SO AWESOME!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heavy. Appears to be good quality
reviews.reviewText: Not as good as another pan I had. Still has sticking challenges
Good non stick and heats up fairly quickly. Cleans up easily.

Es un sartén magnífico! Realmente me sorprende su antiadherente. Es cierto que se debe emplear una pequeña cantidad de aceite para que cumpla su función. Lo uso más para hacer huevo en torta y aunque su inconveniente es su pequeño fondo, con un poco de agilidad se puede dominar para obtener el resultado. Eh freido carnes y guisado frijoles y sin problemas para su limpieza, solo con una pequeña toalla de papel o una esponja suave. Por ahí noté algunas manchas de aceite quemado pero nada que no se pueda quitar con el polvo Bar Keepers Friend. Hasta ahora la capa antiadherente luce intacta.
